description: [Black Basta](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1070) has established persistence by creating a new service named `FAX` after deleting the legitimate service by the same name.(Citation: Minerva Labs Black Basta May 2022)(Citation: Cyble Black Basta May 2022)(Citation: Trend Micro Black Basta May 2022)
